alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 9:40AM CST until December 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Mix Continues Today with Snow Tonight... A wintry mix continues in north-central Wisconsin this morning with another round of heavier snow increasingly likely overnight tonight. Snowfall rates could exceed 1 to 2 inches per hour for a time tonight. Expect difficult to hazardous travel. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Juneau and Adams Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute on Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
